name: Party Lounge VR
description:
Party Lounge VR is Night club simulator game! You play as DJ who also has to work as waiter serving people what they need. The competition is tough and you cannot afford waiters. Transform your club to the best club in town!

NOTICE !!! OCULUS RIFT TESTED ONLY , HTC VIVE MAY NOT BE STABLE!!!!NOTICE 

PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE PLAYING!!!

For sound to work properly COPY "UDSave" to "C:\Users\Admin\AppData\Local\PartyLoungeVR\Saved\SaveGames" folder

FOLDER NOT FOUND? Start the game and then quit after 2 mins in game. 
Then replace the UDSave file with the one in zip file</style="color:>
